objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#e8d6c9'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#d9c0aa'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='borderGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#b07f5c'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#c99e77'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='5' ry='5' fill='none' stroke='#8a5a34' stroke-width='2'/><rect x='80' y='80' width='920' height='920' rx='5' ry='5' fill='none' stroke='#8a5a34' stroke-width='1.5'/></g><g opacity='0.05'><path d='M0,0 L1080,0 L1080,1080 L0,1080 L0,0 Z M40,40 L40,1040 L1040,1040 L1040,40 L40,40 Z' fill='#8a5a34'/><path d='M540,150 L540,930' stroke='#8a5a34' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M150,540 L930,540' stroke='#8a5a34' stroke-width='1'/></g><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M50,50 L50,150 L150,150' stroke='url(#borderGradient)' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><path d='M1030,50 L1030,150 L930,150' stroke='url(#borderGradient)' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><path d='M50,1030 L50,930 L150,930' stroke='url(#borderGradient)' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><path d='M1030,1030 L1030,930 L930,930' stroke='url(#borderGradient)' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/></g><g opacity='0.06'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='none' stroke='#8a5a34' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#8a5a34' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='none' stroke='#8a5a34' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='100' fill='none' stroke='#8a5a34' stroke-width='1'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Premium Faux Leather • Spacious Design • Gold Hardware

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sophisticated product advertisement centered around a tote bag image (“product_image”). A soft beige-to-nude radial gradient forms the background (“background”) with ornate linear and geometric detailing to add refinement. The headline (“heading”) sits at the top in an elegant serif font with a brown hue, followed by a graceful italic subheading ("subheading"). The item description (“description”) is concise and structured with separators to highlight features. A bold price element ("price") stands out beneath it. At the base is a strong call-to-action ("cta") within a rich brown button shape ("cta_background"). The layout is clean, symmetrical, and minimalistic.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Beige: #e8d6c9
- Nude: #d9c0aa
- Rich Brown: #8a5a34  
- Soft Copper: #a06a42  
- Deep Chestnut: #5c4133  
- White (CTA text): #ffffff
product_color: The product image features a stylish handbag in a rich, warm camel brown color (#A9746E) that forms the base of the palette. Gold accents (#D4AF37) in the form of chains, clasps, and branding add a luxurious contrast, enhancing the refined aesthetic. The smooth, matte texture of the leather subtly blends with the metallic shine, creating an elegant interplay between soft and reflective surfaces. Minimalistic use of neutral hues like soft black (#2E2E2E) and ivory (#F9F6F0) in shadows and reflections provides depth. This harmonious color blend highlights sophistication, making it ideal for advertising banners targeting modern luxury and chic elegance.
